channel.title: Comments for page "Robo Fighto"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Robo Fighto"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The Friday Knights and the Flux Capacitor Battle does.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Tiny bees are out of the question—no tournament allows s-rank parts

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So, if you got it, I'd say use the Foam Helmet and Shield, Soul of Steel, Tiny Bee - Left, and either the Foam Legs or Regalia, I dunno which would be best. SoS and the shield add a total of 10% to your push chance, so hopefully you'll make it to that 11th push.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I just now realized i can register my Rifle as an item… doink.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: All E items… Foam Helmet, Foam Container, Foam Launcher, Foam Shield, and Foam Legs. I can't seem to get any S-rank parts… =/

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The Max Pilot bonus can only go as high as the different tiers of parts you have, so only up to +4(G, F, E, S). Just keep training it, I've been stuck at +1 for a while now, just hit 5.3% increase chance -_-. For your score, what set up are you using?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Still having problems going past 700, despite other players going up to and past 6000. Hints please?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Also, how do I raise my Max Pilot bonus? I have +3 max, but that's just it.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Theoretically, what is the best setup amongst the parts, excluding Tiny Bees?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Well, there's really only a couple of ways to raise push chance, other than the 3% from fine tuning. The only ways that I can think of are the 5% each from soul of steel (an f-rank part, so it won't work to get the g-rank, but you can use it in the f-rank ones) and the foam shield, later on. I realize, it's tough at first, before you can use the SoS. But it'll get better.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: how does one raise his/her push chance early on? i have 73% PC, but i might as well have 50, since my highest score is usually 300. assistance!

item.title: Double Item Win
item.content:encoded:
I did this with the foam launcher on a slow day. You get the messages on the main page like normal but you only have the item once. It seems like having items in Robo Fighto is based more on a true or false statement rather than having the item since there is no item counter.

Basically you win twice but only receive the item once. The most that could happen is winning mister roboto from the second tourney.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm, I wonder that myself…in addition, I wonder this: If somehow, the doubletap bonus (+X% chance for double damage) fires on your 11th push, and you've got lvl 1 cranked…would you get 300% damage (additive, each one adds 100%), or 400% damage (doubletap doubles it, then cranked doubles it again)?

item.title: Same time
item.content:encoded:
I meant if you enter two tournaments with the same prize part at the same time.
For example, if NAKED WARRIOR and G-Rank Partswar both have the Corrugated Plating prize, you might enter both.
If you win the first, then you get the part.
Then if you win the second, you already have the part - what happens?

Does that make more sense?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: You're not allowed to enter a part-giving tournament if you already have that part.

item.title: Double Item?
item.content:encoded: What happens if you win two tournaments with the same part as the prize?
